languages.text: {n}Открывшая было рот Джай цепенеет и до побелевших костяшек стискивает на груди аквилу.{/n} "Если бы... я стала перед подобным выбором... Великий бы направил меня по верному пути".

{n}Jae opens her mouth and then freezes, clenching the Aquila on her chest until her knuckles turn white.{/n} "If... I were faced with such a choice... the Exalted One would guide me on the right path."
languages.original_text: {n}Открывшая было рот Джай цепенеет и до побелевших костяшек стискивает на груди аквилу.{/n} "Если бы... я стала перед подобным выбором... Великий бы направил меня по верному пути".

{n}Jae opens her mouth and then freezes, clenching the Aquila on her chest until her knuckles turn white.{/n} "If... I were faced with such a choice... the Exalted One would guide me on the right path."

languages.text: {n}ジェイは口を開いて凍りつくと、拳が白くなるまで胸のアクィラを握りしめる。{/n}「もし…あたしにそんな選択が突きつけられたなら…エグザルテッド・ワンが正しい方向に導いてくれるよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae opens her mouth and then freezes, clenching the Aquila on her chest until her knuckles turn white.{/n} "If... I were faced with such a choice... the Exalted One would guide me on the right path."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは口を開いて凍りつくと、拳が白くなるまで胸のアクィラを握りしめる。{/n}「もし…あたしにそんな選択が突きつけられたなら…エグザルテッド・ワンが正しい方向に導いてくれるよ」

languages.text: {n}婕伊张了张嘴，欲言又止。她紧紧握住胸前的双头鹰吊坠，直到指节发白。{/n}“如果……我要面临那样的选择……至高无上的神皇会指引我踏上正确的道路。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae opens her mouth and then freezes, clenching the Aquila on her chest until her knuckles turn white.{/n} "If... I were faced with such a choice... the Exalted One would guide me on the right path."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊张了张嘴，欲言又止。她紧紧握住胸前的双头鹰吊坠，直到指节发白。{/n}“如果……我要面临那样的选择……至高无上的神皇会指引我踏上正确的道路。”

languages.text: {n}Jae ouvre ma bouche, puis se fige en serrant si fort l'Aquila contre sa poitrine que ses phalanges en deviennent blanches.{/n} « Si... si j'étais confrontée à pareil choix... l'Exalté me montrerait la voie à suivre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae opens her mouth and then freezes, clenching the Aquila on her chest until her knuckles turn white.{/n} "If... I were faced with such a choice... the Exalted One would guide me on the right path."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae ouvre ma bouche, puis se fige en serrant si fort l'Aquila contre sa poitrine que ses phalanges en deviennent blanches.{/n} « Si... si j'étais confrontée à pareil choix... l'Exalté me montrerait la voie à suivre. »

languages.text: {n}Jae abre la boca y se queda paralizada, aferrando el Aquila que tiene en el pecho hasta que sus nudillos se tornan blancos.{/n} «Si... tuviera que tomar una decisión así... el Exaltado me llevaría por el camino correcto».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae opens her mouth and then freezes, clenching the Aquila on her chest until her knuckles turn white.{/n} "If... I were faced with such a choice... the Exalted One would guide me on the right path."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae abre la boca y se queda paralizada, aferrando el Aquila que tiene en el pecho hasta que sus nudillos se tornan blancos.{/n} «Si... tuviera que tomar una decisión así... el Exaltado me llevaría por el camino correcto».

languages.text: {n}Jae öffnet den Mund und erstarrt. Sie umfasst den Adler auf ihrer Brust, bis sich ihre Knöchel weiß färben.{/n} "Falls ... Ich vor einer solchen Entscheidung stünde ... würde mich der Erhabene auf den richtigen Weg führen."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae opens her mouth and then freezes, clenching the Aquila on her chest until her knuckles turn white.{/n} "If... I were faced with such a choice... the Exalted One would guide me on the right path."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae öffnet den Mund und erstarrt. Sie umfasst den Adler auf ihrer Brust, bis sich ihre Knöchel weiß färben.{/n} "Falls ... Ich vor einer solchen Entscheidung stünde ... würde mich der Erhabene auf den richtigen Weg führen."

languages.text: {n}Jae, konuşmak için ağzını açsa da donakalıyor. Sıkı sıkıya yumruk yaptığı parmakları beyaza dönene dek göğsünün üzerinde Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıyor.{/n} "Eğer ki... Böyle bir seçimle karşı karşıya kalsaydım... Görkemli, bana doğru yolu gösterirdi."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae opens her mouth and then freezes, clenching the Aquila on her chest until her knuckles turn white.{/n} "If... I were faced with such a choice... the Exalted One would guide me on the right path."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, konuşmak için ağzını açsa da donakalıyor. Sıkı sıkıya yumruk yaptığı parmakları beyaza dönene dek göğsünün üzerinde Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıyor.{/n} "Eğer ki... Böyle bir seçimle karşı karşıya kalsaydım... Görkemli, bana doğru yolu gösterirdi."
